ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales Presents Oz: Age of Darkness One-Shot
ComicInfo.Summary:
We know how Dorothy's story begins... but how does it end?
Journey into the future of Oz as the Dark Queen releases the Warlord from his emerald prison and back into the realm that put him there. When the Warlord's shadow falls over Oz, death will strike our heroes. Can anyone escape the Warlord with their life, or is Oz and all of its citizens destined for doom?
Age of Darkness Tie-in
